txt.en:
'What a mess. Ever since the workers were scared off by the hauntings in Gaerlond, their tools have been left scattered about.

'This has put a severe strain on our work schedule. Could you perhaps take an account of the worker's tools left abandoned in Barad Rill? Should the workers return, we will need all the tools we can get.

'Hopefully, none are lost.'
Gonodil wants to keep the building efforts organized around Barad Rill.
You should tell Gonodil that you have collected all the tools.\n\nGonodil can be found in Barad Rill.
Talk to Gonodil in Barad Rill
'That takes care of that. Now I can be free of all that clutter. Hopefully the workers return yet to see work on the lighthouse completed.'
Gonodil has asked you to collect all the worker's tools that have been left abandoned.
Talk to Gonodil in Barad Rill
